name: AAARoadService
0:
”Alexa, open AAA Road Service”
”Alexa, ask AAA Road Service to jump start my car”
”Alexa, ask AAA Road Service to change my flat tire”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aaa road service
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From changing flat tires roadside to jumping batteries in your driveway to providing a tow truck when you need it, AAA Road Service can help get you on your way. 

AAA Members can use this service to easily place a request for roadside assistance. The first time you access the service, Alexa will ask to link your AAA Membership account. You will then be prompted to enter your membership number, last name and home zip code. Once you confirm your membership information, you will be able to access AAA Road Service in any car, anytime, anywhere!

Services Provided: 

- Battery Boost/Replacement
- Extrication & Winching
- Fuel Delivery Service
- Tire Service
- Towing
- Vehicle Lock-Out Services

Please enter a location for your Alexa device in your Alexa companion app and allow the AAA Road Service Skill access to your location. Make sure to pronounce AAA as Triple A.
 
To get started, just say “Alexa, open AAA Road Service”.
